pages.text: Living Armor adapts to your magical practices. When practicing Ars Nouveau's glyph-based magic, your armor learns and evolves, unlocking the $(bold)Source Attunement$() upgrade path designed specifically for source-wielding mages.
$(blood)Source-Infused Armor$()$(br2)Cast Ars Nouveau spells while wearing Living Armor to gain experience. Your armor attunes to the flow of Source energy, growing stronger with each glyph you cast.

pages.title: XP from Glyphs
pages.text: Every Ars Nouveau spell you cast grants XP to your Living Armor based on its complexity:$(br2)$(bold)Formula:$()$(br)Base XP (5) × Number of Glyphs$(br2)$(italic)Example: A spell with 6 glyphs grants 5 × 6 = 30 XP$()$(br2)More complex spells with many glyphs will level your armor faster. Experiment with elaborate spell combinations to maximize your progression!

pages.title: Source Attunement
pages.text: The Source Attunement upgrade tree provides five levels of powerful spell enhancements:$(br2)$(blood)Level 1:$() +5% Spell Damage$(br2)$(blood)Level 2:$() +10% Spell Damage$(br2)$(blood)Level 3:$() +15% Spell Damage$(br2)$(blood)Level 4:$() +20% Spell Damage$(br)Mana Regen buff (4s)$(br2)$(blood)Level 5:$() +25% Spell Damage$(br)Mana Cost -20%$(br)Spell Damage III buff (5s)

pages.title: Upgrade Costs
pages.text: Each level requires Living Armor points:$(br2)• $(blood)Level 1:$() 5 points$(br)• $(blood)Level 2:$() 10 points$(br)• $(blood)Level 3:$() 15 points$(br)• $(blood)Level 4:$() 20 points$(br)• $(blood)Level 5:$() 25 points$(br2)$(bold)Total:$() 75 points for all levels$(br2)These points are earned through Living Armor's normal progression system - wear the armor, gain XP from spell casting and other sources.

pages.title: Level Details
pages.text: $(bold)Levels 1-3: Increasing Spell Damage$()$(br)Each level adds +5% spell damage. By level 3, you're dealing 15% more damage with all Ars Nouveau spells.$(br2)$(bold)Level 4: Damage & Regen$()$(br)Spell damage increases to +20%. Additionally, every spell cast grants you the $(effect)Mana Regeneration$() effect for 4 seconds, helping you recover mana faster.$(br2)$(bold)Level 5: Ultimate Power$()$(br)Peak performance at +25% spell damage. Casting spells grants $(effect)Spell Damage III$() for 5 seconds AND refunds 20% of the mana cost!

pages.title: Synergies
pages.text: $(bold)Synergies:$()$(br)• Stack Spell Damage III with Ars Nouveau's native damage buffs$(br)• Level 4 Mana Regen helps with sustained casting$(br)• Level 5's 20% mana refund makes expensive spells more viable$(br)• Combine with mana-generating equipment for infinite casting$(br)• Pair with speed enchantments to cast more frequently$(br)• Use with other Living Armor upgrades for balanced combat$(br2)At max level, you're a spell-slinging powerhouse with massive damage and efficient mana usage!

pages.title: Tips & Strategy
pages.text: $(bold)Maximize XP Gain:$()$(br)• Create longer, more complex spells$(br)• Each glyph counts toward XP$(br)• Practice new spell combinations$(br)• Cast frequently while exploring$(br2)$(bold)Build Paths:$()$(br)• Pure Source Mage: Max Source Attunement first$(br)• Battlemage: Balance with melee upgrades$(br)• Tank Mage: Combine with defensive upgrades$(br2)$(italic)Remember: XP is only granted while wearing Living Armor!$()
